Breakpoint Removal Summary Dialog Box

Requires: Base Development System

Select Edit»Remove Breakpoints from Hierarchy to remove all the breakpoints in the current VI and its hierarchy and to display this dialog box.

Use this dialog box to view the breakpoints LabVIEW removes from the VI hierarchy.

This dialog box includes the following components:

  • Message—Displays the total number of breakpoints LabVIEW removes from the VI hierarchy.
  • Details—Displays the details for each breakpoint that was removed from the VI hierarchy. If LabVIEW cannot remove breakpoints from the VI hierarchy, the Details section displays an error message.
